tool_description: Cloudflare 1.1.1.1: Faster & Safer Internet unlimited warp+ data.
name: Cloudflare 1-1-1-1 unlimited warp plus
title: Cloudflare 1-1-1-1 unlimited warp plus

api_list.name: Get 1GB Warp+
api_list.description:
To get 1GB Wrap+ data we will need the ID from 1.1.1.1 app. The process of getting the ID is as follows:

1) Open 1.1.1.1 app (Android/Ios)
2) Click on options icon (which is placed in top right corner)
3) Click on "Advanced" option.
4) Now click on "Diagnostics" option.
5) Now, you will be able to see "ID" which is under "CLIENT CONFIGURATION" section. Copy the ID and use the ID while triggering this API.

If you trigger this API, on success you will get notification on your phone that you got 1GB Wrap+ data. But you may not see any changes in your data remaining section. 

Basically, you get 1GB data, but is not applied on your phone yet. To apply the data in your app, you may need to do the following things:

1) Click on options icon (which is placed in top right corner)
2) Click on "Advanced" option.
3) Now click on "Connection options" option.
4) Finally, click on "Reset security keys"

Holla !! You got the Referrer bonus on your account successfully. :D


N:B: You don't need to apply the 2nd method every time you trigger the API. After performing a bunch of API calls, you can follow the 2nd procedure of applying the data into your account. 

Send me a message, or open the discussion, if you face any kind of trouble.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cloudflare-1-1-1-1-unlimited-warp-plus.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cloudflare-1-1-1-1-unlimited-warp-plus.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

url = "https://cloudflare-1-1-1-1-unlimited-warp-plus.p.rapidapi.com/"

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
